Rayon Sports vs Etincelles FC

Rayon Sports 1-0 Etincelles FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

16:33

Amakipe yombi agarutse mu kibuga

Nyuma y'ikiruhuko cy'iminota 15 irimo inama z'abatoza ku mpande zombi, abakinnyi bagarutse mu kibuga baritegura gutangira igice cya kabiri

16:20

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Rutahizamu Jules Ulimwengu atangiye neza afasha Rayon Sports gutsinda Etincelles FC 1-0 mu gice cya mbere imbere ya Etincelles FC mu mukino we wa mbere muri Rayon Sports

16:15

Iminota ine y'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Iminota 45 ya mbere irangiye Rayon Sports iyoboye umukino igitego 1-0

16:12

43' Koruneri ya mbere ya Etincelles FC

Muganza Joachim acenze ba myugariro babiri ba Rayon Sports barimo Rutanga agerageza guhindura umupira ashaka rutahizamu mushya Mutebi Rashid bavanye muri Mukura VS, ariko Rutanga arawurenza. Koruneri ya mbere ya Etincelles FC ntacyo ibyaye

16:07

33' Umukino ubaye uhagaze

Umupira uhinduwe na Saddam Nyandwi awohereza mu rubuga rw'amahina, Raphael DaSiva agongana na Rucogoza Aimable Mambo, Mambo arakomereka bikomeye ku mutwe. Ubu abaganga b'amakipe yombi bashyize hamwe bari kumwitaho. Ni ikimenyetso cy'uko ruhago atari intambara

16:02

29' Rutanga ahushije coup franc ya gatatu

Myugariro w'ibumoso wa Rayon Sports Rutanga Eric usanzwe uzwiho ubuhanga mu gutera imipira y'imiterekano, amaze guhusha coup franc eshatu mu minota 30 ya mbere y'umukino

16:00

28' Ikarita ya kabiri y'umuhondo ku ruhande rwa Etincelles FC

Fabrice Mugheni na Raphael DaSilva bahererekanyije umupira bihuta bagana ku izamu rya Etincelles FC, DaSilva akorerwa ikosa na Nahimana Isiaka. Habonetse coup franc, n'ikarita y'umuhondo ku ruhande rwa Etincelles FC

15:56

25' Raphael DaSilva ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Kugera ubu ntabwo Etincelles FC iragera ku izamu rya Rayon Sports. Nyuma yo guhererekanya neza kwa Manzi Thierry na Sarpong ba Rayon, umupira ugeze kuri rutahizamu Jonathan Raphael DaSilva agerageza gutungura umunyezamu wa Etincelles FC ariko awukuramo neza

15:50

Mu yindi mikino, Agashya i Nyagatare

Ikipe ya Mukura VS yagiye gusura Sunrise i Nyagatare, ijyana imyenda yayo isanzwe y'umuhondo n'iyo yambara iyo yasohotse ifite amabara ya 'mauve'. Aya mabara yombi Sunrise FC. Abakinnyi bari bambaye 'Mauve', umunyezamu yambaye umuhondo.

Umusifuzi yasabye Mukura VS gushaka indi myenda itandukanye n'aya mabara yombi biba ngombwa ko itira imwe mu makipe y'abana y'i Nyagatare, yambara imyenda isa n'ubururu bwerurutse.

15:46

14' Nsengimana Dominique atabaye izamu rya Etincelles FC

Ikipe ya Etincelles FC irugarijwe. Rutahizamu Raphael Jonathan DaSilva akorewe ikosa haboneka coup franc itewe na Rutanga ayitera mu mfuruka y'izamu ariko umunyezamu Nsengimana Dominique aratabara ashyira umupira hanze

15:42

11' IGITEGO CYA MBERE CYA RAYON SPORTS CYA JULES ULIMWENGU

Rutanga Eric akorewe ikosa na Rucogoza Aimable Mambo, haboneka coup franc iterwa neza na Rutanga, igera kuri Sarpong utazuyaje aha Jules Ulimwengu atera ishoti rikomeye umunyezamu Nsengimana ntiyashobora kongera gutabara izamu rya Etincelles FC Rayon Sports ibona igitego cya mbere

15:40

08' Ulimwengu Jules imbere y'izamu rya Etincelles FC birakomeye

Umupira uzamukanywe na Rutanga Eric ku ruhande rw'ibumoso, acomekera umupira rutahizamu Jules Ulimwengu acenga Hertier Turatsinze asigarana n'umunyezamu wenyine, agerageje gutera mu izamu umupira ukubita ku kirenge cya Nsengimana Dominique, atabara izamu

15:36

05' Rayon Sports itangiye yotsa igitutu Etincelles FC

Umupira uzamukanywe na Fabrice Mugheni aha umupira Michael Sarpong akorerwa ikosa na Rucogoza Aimable Mambo haboneka coup franc iterwa na Rutanga Eric ariko umunyezamu Nsengimana Dominique awushyira muri Korueri itagize icyo ibyara

15:30

Abakinnyi 11 babanje mu kibuga ku mpande zombi

15:30

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi ahushye mu ifirimbi, umukino utangijwe na Etincelles FC

15:29

Abafana si benshi

Kuba umukino ugiye gukinwa ku munsi w'akazi kandi Rayon Sports itari mu bihe byiza bishobora kuba aribyo byabaye impamvu yo kubura kw'abafana kuko muri stade ya Kigali harimo abafana batageze no kuri 40% y'abasanzwe bayuzura

15:25

Abakinnyi b'impande zombi basohotse mu rwambariro

Erincelles FC mu mabara y'umutuku, Rayon Sports mu mabara y'ubururu, abakinnyi b'impande zombi basohotse mu rwambariro bagiye gutangira umukino w'umunsi 16 wa shampiyona

15:22

Uko amakipe yombi yitwaye mu mikino itanu iheruka

Umusifuzi Ngabonziza Dieudonne yemeje ko iminota yo kwishyushya yarangiye basubiye mu rwambariro. Mu minota mike baragaruka batangira umukino.

15:20

Etincelles FC igiye guhangana na Rayon Sports idafite zimwe mu nkingi za mwamba



Abakinnyi 18 Etincelles FC yahagurukanye i Rubavu ntabwo barimo kapiteni wayo Mumbele Saiba Claude bita Kizizi, Akayezu Jean Bosco na Muganza Isaac bafite amakirita atatu y'imihondo na Tuyisenge Hakim wavunitse.

15:11
